divs: Sighting DetailsWent out side to get some air around 6pm saw a star like light in the sky moving very slow SW got the video cam out starting recording...Don't know what it is but I recorded it 3 days last week in the same place S-SW.
Summary: Went out side to get some air around 6pm saw a star like light in the sky
